MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK10 and FK13 postcode areas of Alloa and Tillicoultry. Engineers are in the process of carrying out repairs on the grounded overhead line close to Birkhill Cottage and we still expect all power to be restored by 8pm. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:55pm on 2nd February 2021.
